summary: Adds a female High Elf Spellsword/Ice Mage to the game.  With CBBE, ApachiiSkyHair, and Blindfolds
descriptionHtml:
Zekthra is located in Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath.

Zekthra aims to be more than just a generic follower, as this is just an alpha test to see if she works properly.

So far she only has slightly edited stats and gear, but I plan to change those in later releases.
You don\'t need any of the mods below, as all her files are packaged together into one.



Blindfolds of Skyrim: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551

CBBE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?

ApachiiSkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
author: SgtHighwaters
